price: 58 Nul, en dehors d’Allah, ne saurait la repousser[1353].
arabic: لَيۡسَ لَهَا مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ كَاشِفَةٌ
footnotes: [1353] Autre sens : nul, en dehors d’Allah, n’en connaît l’avènement.

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: laysa lahā min dūni al-lahi kāshifatun
